synopsis.text:
Every morning, a dedicated team of construction workers, all of whom are rabbits, wake up with one goal in mind: to give everything they've got and be the best. Known as Zenryoku Usagi, these hardworking bunnies are the stars of an animated short series that aired in Japan within the Chibi Ani Gekij≈ç program.

Zenryoku Engineering Company, the team's official name, is led by a hip-hop loving boss named Oyakata. Joining him are Ojou, an aggressive worker, and Minarai, a former babysitter turned apprentice carpenter. Together, this motivated team takes on a variety of construction projects, from unearthing ancient fossils to building bridges that help young rabbits find their way home.

Despite the challenges they face, Zenryoku Usagi always stays true to their motto of doing their very best. With a positive attitude and a strong sense of camaraderie, these little bunnies support each other and work hard to complete every job to the best of their abilities. So, if you're looking for a fun and inspiring anime, be sure to check out Zenryoku Usagi and watch as these adorable rabbits take on the world of construction!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
